productBaseInfoV1.title: Hitachi 1.5 Tons 5 Star Split AC Copper
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: This summer make every day pleasant by getting home this Hitachi 1.5 Tons Split AC. With this 5-Star AC installed in your house, you can relax on your bean bag as the rest will be handled by the AC itself - it adjusts the temperature according to the weather conditions around you and make every day and every hour pleasant.

productShippingInfoV1.estimatedDeliveryTime: Usually Delivered in Tue Sep 06 23:59:59 IST 2016 - Wed Sep 07 23:59:59 IST 2016 days.

value: Indoor Unit, Outdoor Unit, Installation Kit, Operation Manual, Remote Control

values.key: Indoor W x H x D
Outdoor W x H x D

value:
Standard installation is provided free of cost.

After delivery of your Air-conditioner, you will receive a ticket number via message. Post that, you will receive a call from the brand authorized service engineer to schedule a mutually convenient.

Split AC:-

Drilling of hole in Brick wall for taking out the pipes

Fixing hole sleeve & Cap

Fixing the Indoor and Outdoor Unit

Connecting Indoor and Outdoor units using Standard Kit provided by Manufacturer (at an additional cost, unless specified otherwise)

Wrapping the pipe with seasoning tape

Connection to Stabilizer or Power point in the range of Power Cord Provided by Manufacture

Temperature/Performance Check & Demo and Maintenance tips filling the details in warranty card

Not covered in installation:-

Out Door Unit Stand

Extra copper wire if any

Drain Pipe extension if any

Plumbing and Masonry Work

Wiring extension from Meter to site, Power point/MCB fitting and any other electrical work,Carpentry work

Dismantling/Shifting of Old AC's

Masonry, Core Cutting Fabrication and Electrical

Authorized Service Engineer will do the following, Repair / change the defective part, Provide replacement to the customer in case part / product not repairable (only after replacement request approved), Repair Services
In case of returns, Flipkart's team will visit the customers location, Uninstall, Pack, Pick-up the product
Two Free Services of AC within Warranty Period on Demand
1 Year on Complete Unit and 5 Years on Compressor
Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only.

Warranty does not Cover Any External Accessories (such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorised Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Hitachi 1.5 Tons Inverter Split AC Copper
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Don’t let the summer heat get to you - get home this Hitachi Inverter Split AC and make summers pleasant. With its 4-way air swing option, this AC cools every nook and corner of your room and uses optimal power. So sit back and relax as this copper color AC will cool the room.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Onida 1 Ton 3 Star Split AC White
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: If there’s anything your home needs this summer, it’s this stylish and ergonomically designed split AC from Onida. Equipped with HD filters that purify the air in your home, and operating on 1117 W of energy, it’s crafted to be both performance-oriented and energy-efficient.

productShippingInfoV1.estimatedDeliveryTime: Usually Delivered in Tue Sep 06 23:59:59 IST 2016 - Wed Sep 07 23:59:59 IST 2016 days.

value:
Installation of Air-conditioner is charged extra to customer at the time of installation and needs to be paid directly to the service engineer

After the product is delivered through our delivery partners, we'll facilitate the installation of AC through authorized service engineer at your convenience. The installation will be done within 3 Business days of delivery. A Stabilizer if bought along with the product will be installed along with the AC

Standard installation charge for Split AC is, Approx Rs 1500 - 2000 (Applicable Charges Extra)

Standard Installation of AC Covers only

Split AC:-

  • Drilling of hole in Brick wall for taking out the pipes.
  • Fixing hole sleeve & Cap.
  • Fixing the Indoor and Outdoor Unit.
  • Connecting Indoor and Outdoor units using Standard Kit provided by Manufacturer (at an additional cost, unless specified otherwise).
  • Wrapping the pipe with seasoning tape.
  • Connection to Stabilizer or Power point in the range of Power Cord Provided by Manufacture.
  • Temperature/Performance Check & Demo and Maintenance tips filling the details in warranty card.

Not covered in installation:-

  • Out Door Unit Stand.
  • Extra copper wire if any.
  • Drain Pipe extension if any.
  • Plumbing and Masonry Work.
  • Wiring extension from Meter to site, Power point/MCB fitting and any other electrical work,Carpentry work.
  • Dismantling/Shifting of Old AC's
  • Masonry, Core Cutting Fabrication and Electrical.

Authorized Service Engineer will do the following, Repair / change the defective part, Provide replacement to the customer in case part / product not repairable (only after replacement request approved), Repair Services
In case of returns, Flipkart's team will visit the customers location, Uninstall, Pack, Pick-up the product
Two Free Services of AC within Warranty Period on Demand
1 Year for the Product & 5 Years for the Compressor

Air Conditioner (Except the Front Grill, Knobs, Remote Unit and Add on Plastic Parts) to the Original Purchase to be Free from Defects in Materials and Workmanship Within One Year from the Date of Purchase Warranty for Compressor, MIRC Electronics Limited, Hereafter Warranty to the Purchaser of this Onida Air Conditioner that for a Period of Sixty Months from the Date of Invoice

Any Loss of Refrigerant Caused due to Sabotage, Improper Handling or Treatment, Carelessness, Accident, Fire, Flood Earthquake or Any Natural Calamity any Corrosive Action on the Original Refrigerant Pipes, Fittings, Valves etc or Whatever Reasons, Shall not be Covered Under this Warranty, In the Event of any Change in the Location of the Unit During the Warranty Period, This Warranty Shall become Null and Void Unless the Fact of the Proposed Change is Communicated in Writing to the Authorized Dealer Atleast Seven Days Prior to the Said Change, On Receipt of Such Information the Authorized Dealer or Any of its Counter Parts Shall Arrange for De-installation of the Said Unit on Chargeable Basis, However in the Event of any Damage Occurring to the Unit or to any of its Parts During the Course of its Transit by the Said Purchaser, Repair or Replacement, The Said Unit or any Part there of Damaged (The Front Grill, Knobs, Remote Unit and Add on Plastic Parts ) Shall not be Covered by this Warranty

productBaseInfoV1.title: Sansui 1 Ton 5 Star Split AC White
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Whether it is for your home or for your office, this split AC keeps you comfortable and ensures that you breathe fresh air. The Catechin filter and active carbon filter in the AC eliminates all dust particles and odors that can be very embarrassing when you have a guest at your door.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Hitachi 1 Ton Inverter Split AC Copper
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: If hot summer nights are messing up your sleep cycle, then it’s time you did something. If you ask us, we’ll recommend this Hitachi AC. Install this in your room and keep humidity and unbearable heat outside. Packed with powerful features, this AC is sure to keep your room pleasant.

productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: This Sansui split AC is everything you would expect from a smart appliance. Other than being energy-efficient, it’s equipped with active carbon filters that help eliminate odors, a catechin filter which deactivates germs and bacteria, a silver ion filter, and a blue fin evaporator which protects it from corrosion.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Carrier 1.5 Tons 5 Star Split AC White
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: This summer, beat the heat with this Carrier Ester split AC. Other than keeping your home cool and comfortable, this AC keeps bacteria and germs out – thanks to its i-PM 2.5 filter. Don’t want to wait for the appliance to take its sweet time getting started? Set its turbo mode on and you can enjoy fast cooling.
offers: No Cost EMI on Credit Cards
No Cost EMI on Bajaj Finserv Cards

Installation of Air-conditioner is charged extra to customer at the time of installation and needs to be paid directly to the service engineer

Once the product is delivered through our delivery partners, we'll facilitate the installation of AC through Jeeves Consumer Services Flipkarts authorized installation partner at your convenience.The installation will be done within 2 Business days days of delivery.A Stabilizer if bought along with the product will be installed along with the AC or else you may buy the same from the engineer as per the rate card published in Jeeves Consumer Services Website or the standard rate card published

Standard installation charge for Split AC is Rs 1499 (including taxes)

Removal of your old AC (uninstallation): Rs. 650 + Applicable Taxes

Charges for Extra Material (if required): Wall Mount Bracket Rs. 650; Copper Pipe Rs. 650/Mtr; any other material would be charged as per actuals which engineer will tell at the time of installation based on the site’s requirement.

Standard Installation of Split AC Covers only

Split AC:-

  • Drilling of hole in Brick wall for taking out the pipes
  • Fixing hole sleeve & Cap
  • Fixing the Indoor and Outdoor Unit.
  • Connecting Indoor and Outdoor units using Standard Kit provided by Manufacturer (at an additional cost, unless specified otherwise).
  • Wrapping the pipe with seasoning tape.
  • Connection to Stabilizer or Power point in the range of Power Cord Provided by Manufacture.
  • Temperature/Performance Check & Demo and Maintenance tips filling the details in warranty card.

    • Not covered in installation:-

  • Out Door Unit Stand.
  • Extra copper wire if any.
  • Drain Pipe extension if any.
  • Plumbing and Masonry Work.
  • Wiring extension from Meter to site, Power point/MCB fitting and any other electrical work,Carpentry work.
  • Dismantling/Shifting of Old AC's Masonry, Core Cutting Fabrication and Electrical

Authorized Service Engineer will do the following, Repair / change the defective part, Provide replacement to the customer in case part / product not repairable (only after replacement request approved), Repair Services
In case of returns, Flipkart's team will visit the customers location, Uninstall, Pack, Pick-up the product
1 Year on Complete Unit and 4 Years on Compressor
Warranty on All Functional Part of AC Other than Aesthetic Parts (Plastic Parts)

Warranty does Not Cover Indoor Unit, Outdoor Unit, Covers if get Damaged and Other Plastic Parts. If Any Mishandling from Customer on AC, Fire Accident to AC, If Fire Source is External, Natural Calamity, Tampered Parts Will Not be Covered under Warranty

productBaseInfoV1.title: Sansui 1.5 Tons 5 Star Split AC White
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: If you want a cooling appliance that not only keeps your surroundings cool, but also maintains itself, you have this Sansui split AC. With features like active carbon filters that work to eliminate bad odor, catechin filters that deactivates bacteria and germs, and a blue fin evaporator which protects it from corrosion, this air conditioner is a great investment.
